text.astromine.message.holographic_conne: 在 %s 和 %s 的投影機連線成功。
在 %s 和 %s 的投影機連線失敗。
text.astromine.manual.obtain.info: The Astromine Manual can be obtained by right clicking a Metite Axe on a Bookshelf.
text.astromine.patchouli.astronautics.de: 從一個夢想，到他們的夢想成真的地方。
text.astromine.patchouli.components.desc: 製作物品以幫助你的旅程。
text.astromine.patchouli.creatures.title: 生物
text.astromine.patchouli.creatures.descr: 那些超出我們想象範圍的東西.
text.astromine.patchouli.gadgets.title: 小工具
text.astromine.patchouli.gadgets.descrip: 在人們的旅途中提供有用的援助。
text.astromine.patchouli.machinery.title: 機械
text.astromine.patchouli.machinery.descr: 什麼能改變自己的世界。
text.astromine.patchouli.resources.title: 資源
text.astromine.patchouli.resources.descr: 一種能獲得動力的精緻材料渠道.
text.astromine.patchouli.warfare.title: 戰爭
text.astromine.patchouli.warfare.descrip: 這是人們用來消滅他們的敵人的武器。
text.astromine.patchouli.world.title: 世界
text.astromine.astronautics.space_suit.p: 太空服對於在惡劣環境中生存至關重要，它是一個人隨身攜帶的最重要的東西。$(p)對於某些機器中可能加壓的內部油箱，它可以充滿（不）可呼吸的氣體，適合任何佩戴者.
text.astromine.astronautics.rocket.title: 火箭
text.astromine.astronautics.rocket.page_: 使用$(item)打火石$()右鍵單擊來發射. 使用$(item)木棍$()右鍵單擊來摧毀. 這些都是臨時措施和說明.
text.astromine.components.circuits.title: 晶片
text.astromine.components.circuits.page_: 一種基本的電路板，為沒有特殊要求的一般系統而設計，其結構是基於石墨烯的.
一種更先進的電路板，為低延遲的系統設計，其結構基於石墨烯.
一種精英電路板，為具有高吞吐量和低延遲的系統而設計，其結構使用令人垂涎的實驗室所製造的材料.
text.astromine.components.gears.title: 齒輪
text.astromine.components.gears.page_one: 一個帶有牙齒的小輪子，齒輪相互聯鎖，可以轉動以實現任意數量的東西。$(P)因此，它們將在構造有用的$(thing)機器$()方面有很大的用途.
text.astromine.components.gears.page_two: 雖然顯示的配方顯然是針對$(item)鐵齒輪$()的, 但只要用任何其他$(thing)錠$()替換$(item)鐵錠$()就可以創建出這種型別的齒輪.
text.astromine.components.plates.title: 金屬板
text.astromine.components.plates.page_on: 薄的的金屬片和板材，是為$(thing)機械$()建立有用的$(thing)外殼$()的材料.
text.astromine.components.plates.page_tw: 雖然顯示的配方顯然是針對$(item)鐵板$()的, 但只要用任何其他$(thing)錠$()替換$(item)鐵錠$()就可以創建出這種型別的齒輪..
text.astromine.creatures.space_slime.pag: 居住在大片可穿越空間的凶猛對手.
擊敗時，$(thing)太空史萊姆$()將掉落$(thing)太空粘液球$().
text.astromine.gadgets.fire_extinguisher: 作為太空旅行中的一個重要工具，它負責提供可操縱的推力.$(p)令人驚訝的是，它還能滅火.
text.astromine.machinery.holographic_bri: 一種機器，它能夠和另一種同類機器之間產生全息橋樑；可與$(item)$(l:gadgets/holographic_connector)全息聯結器$()相互連線.
text.astromine.gadgets.holographic_conne: 一個連線裝置可以讓你把$(item)$(l:gadgets/holographic_bridge_projector)全息橋投影器$()連線在一起. 它們必須在同一條直線上面對面，但可以有不同的高度.
text.astromine.machinery.creative_buffer: 無限量地生產一個指定的$(thing)物品$()的機器.
text.astromine.machinery.creative_capaci: 能無限地產生$(thing)能量$()的機器.
text.astromine.machinery.creative_tank.p: 一種生產特定產品$(thing)液體$()的機器.
text.astromine.machinery.electric_smelte: 一種機器，它消耗$(thing)能量$()來將$(thing)物品$()熔鍊成有用的材料.
text.astromine.machinery.electrolyzer.pa: 一種機器，它消耗$(thing)能量$()來將$(thing)液體$()電解成有用材料的機器.
text.astromine.machinery.energy_cable.pa: 一種傳輸$(thing)能量$()的電纜，不需要緩衝或尋徑.
text.astromine.machinery.fluid_cable.pag: 一種傳輸$(thing)液體$()的電纜，不需要緩衝或尋徑.
text.astromine.machinery.fluid_extractor: 一種消耗$(thing)能量$()來從星球上收集$(thing)液體$()的機器.
A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to place $(thing)fluids$() in the world.
text.astromine.machinery.fluid_mixer.pag: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to mix $(thing)fluids$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.block_breaker.p: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to break and pick up $(thing)blocks$() from the world.
text.astromine.machinery.block_placer.pa: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to place $(thing)blocks$() in the world.
text.astromine.machinery.triturator.page: 一種機器，它消耗$(thing)能量$()來將$(thing)物品$()分類為有用的材料.
text.astromine.machinery.presser.title: Presser
text.astromine.machinery.presser.page_on: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to press $(thing)items$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.vent.title: 通風口
text.astromine.machinery.vent.page_one.t: 一種消耗能量使液體進入大氣的機器.
text.astromine.resources.copper.title: 銅
text.astromine.resources.copper.page_one: 一種非常常用的金屬，具有高熱電導性和獨特的橙色顏色。
text.astromine.resources.copper.page_two: $(item)Copper Ore$() can be commonly found $(thing)underground$() in $(thing)The Overworld$().$(p)Mining requires only a $(item)Stone Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 1) or better, and can then be $(thing)smelted$() into a $(item)Copper Ingot$().
text.astromine.resources.copper.page_thr: Copper is very useful for basic electronics and tools. When combined with $(item)$(l:resources/tin)Tin$() in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(), it can make $(item)$(l:resources/bronze)Bronze$().
text.astromine.resources.copper.page_fou: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 1$(br)Base Durability: 200$(br)Mining Speed: 4$(br)Attack Damage: 1.5$(br)Enchantability: 10$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 12$(br)Total Defense: 12$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 15
text.astromine.resources.tin.title: 錫
text.astromine.resources.tin.page_one.te: A common metal with a silvery sheen and a soft composition.
text.astromine.resources.tin.page_two.te: $(item)Tin Ore$() can be commonly found $(thing)underground$() in $(thing)The Overworld$().$(p)Mining requires only a $(item)Stone Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 1) or better, and can then be $(thing)smelted$() into a $(item)Tin Ingot$().
Tin is useful for plating to prevent corrosion. When combined with $(item)$(l:resources/copper)Copper$() in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(), it can make $(item)$(l:resources/bronze)Bronze$().
text.astromine.resources.tin.page_four.t: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 1$(br)Base Durability: 200$(br)Mining Speed: 5$(br)Attack Damage: 1.0$(br)Enchantability: 10$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 12$(br)Total Defense: 12$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 15
text.astromine.resources.bronze.title: 青銅
text.astromine.resources.bronze.page_one: An alloy of $(item)$(l:resources/copper)Copper$() and $(item)$(l:resources/tin)Tin$(), Bronze manages to be stronger and more durable than either of them.
text.astromine.resources.bronze.page_two: Bronze can be obtained by combining 3 Copper Ingots and 1 Tin Ingot in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces 4 $(item)Bronze Ingots$().
text.astromine.resources.bronze.page_thr: Bronze is useful for creating tools, and is also used in construction of more advanced machines.
text.astromine.resources.bronze.page_fou: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 539$(br)Mining Speed: 7$(br)Attack Damage: 2.5$(br)Enchantability: 20$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 20$(br)Total Defense: 15$(br)Toughness: 0.7$(br)Enchantability: 18
text.astromine.resources.steel.title: 鋼
An alloy of $(item)Iron$() and $(thing)Carbon$(), Steel is incredibly strong for a metal of terrestrial origin.
Steel can be obtained by combining an Iron Ingot and 2 $(item)Coal Dust$() or $(item)Charcoal Dust$() in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces a single $(item)Steel Ingot$().
text.astromine.resources.steel.page_thre: Steel is useful for creating tools, and is also used in construction of more advanced machines.
text.astromine.resources.steel.page_four: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 3$(br)Base Durability: 1043$(br)Mining Speed: 7.5$(br)Attack Damage: 3$(br)Enchantability: 24$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 24$(br)Total Defense: 17$(br)Toughness: 0.5$(br)Enchantability: 18
text.astromine.resources.asterite.title: 星行石
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_o: 這顆紅色寶石是一顆死了很久的恆星的碎片，在未經訓練的觀察者看來可能很脆弱，因為他們不知道它的顯著優勢. $(p)它的特效能使合格的工匠能夠製造出強大的工具.
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_t: $(item)星行礦石$()能夠在$(thing)太空$()中的$(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)小行星$()上發現.$(p)採礦需要$(item)下界合金鎬$()開採等級: 4或更高級別，通常產生一個$(item)星行石簇$()它可以鍛造成$(item)星行石$()這種寶石.
小行星的產物能夠用來建立強大的工具.
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_f: $(l)工具$()$(br)開採等級: 5$(br)基礎耐久: 2015$(br)開採速度: 10$(br)攻擊傷害: 5$(br)附魔: 20$(p)$(l)護甲$()$(br)耐久性乘數: 22$(br)全面防禦: 23$(br)韌性: 4$(br)附魔: 20
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.title: 星系石
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_o: 一個帶有深暗色系的稀有寶石。超高密度，這種材料被理論為從銀河中心的叢集中獲得。 $(p)可惜沒有關於這種現象的記錄，但一個人的旅程是許多祕密的鑰匙.
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_t: $(item)星系礦石$()能夠在$(thing)太空$()中的$(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)小行星$()上發現.$(p)採礦需要$(item)星行石鎬$()開採等級: 5或更高級別，通常產生一個$(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)星系石簇$()它可以鍛造成$(item)星系石$()這種寶石.
星系石可以用來製造極其耐用的工具和尖端技術.
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_f: $(l)工具$()$(br)開採等級: 6$(br)基礎耐久: 3072$(br)開採速度: 11$(br)攻擊傷害: 5$(br)附魔: 18$(p)$(l)護甲$()$(br)耐久性乘數: 44$(br)全面防禦: 25$(br)韌性: 4.5$(br)附魔: 18
text.astromine.resources.metite.title: 梅蒂特
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_one: 一種外來金屬，梅蒂特能承受巨大的壓力，是在太空旅行的所有領域都是必不可少的.$(p)獲得它被認為是在星際旅行中的重要起步基石.
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_two: $(item)梅蒂特礦石$()能夠在$(thing)地球$()上的$(thing)$(l:world/meteors)流星$()中發現, 或者在$(thing)太空$()中的$(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)小行星$()中發現.$(p)採礦需要$(item)下界合金鎬$()開採等級: 5或更高級別，通常產生1至3格$(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)梅蒂特簇$()它可以鍛造成$(item)梅蒂特錠$().
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_thr: 梅蒂特可以用來建立基本的工具；然而，它在宇航技術方面更加有用.
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_fou: $(l)工具$()$(br)開採等級: 2$(br)基礎耐久: 981$(br)開採速度: 14$(br)攻擊傷害: 5$(br)附魔: 5$(p)$(l)護甲$()$(br)耐久性乘數: 15$(br)全面防禦: 14$(br)韌性: 0$(br)附魔: 7
text.astromine.resources.stellum.title: 斯泰姆
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_on: 這是一個活恆星的碎片，它所包含的原始能量只有很少的一部分，它的每一個分子都因為$(thing)恆星能量$()而振動.
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_tw: $(item)斯泰姆礦石$()能夠在$(thing)太空$()中的$(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)小行星$()上發現.$(p)開採等級: 5或更高級別，通常產生一個$(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)斯泰姆簇$()它可以鍛造成$(item)斯泰姆錠$().
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_th: 斯泰姆可用於製造功能強大的工具，大致相當於$(thing)$(l:resources/asterite)星行石$(). 它誕生於一顆活的恆星的核心，具有前所未有的防火效能，並且擁有一種能量，一旦加以利用，就能為整個文明提供動力.
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_fo: $(l)工具$()$(br)開採等級: 5$(br)基礎耐久: 2643$(br)開採速度: 8$(br)攻擊傷害: 6$(br)附魔: 15$(br)火焰防護$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)耐久性乘數: 41$(br)全面防禦: 16$(br)韌性: 6$(br)附魔: 15$(br)火焰防護
text.astromine.resources.univite.title: 鈾特
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_on: 一種如此令人垂涎的物質引發了無數次星際戰爭; 它只存在於這個領域中,數量有限，被認為是宇宙的中心的起源，甚至在我們任何人認為的其所存在之前就存在了. 目前還不清楚是否有任何材料能比鈾特提供更高的能量.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_tw: 一個理論化的起源和有限的存在意味著存在巨大的獲得困難，除了偷竊之外，小文明是沒有辦法獲得它的.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_th: 鈾特可以用來製造最強大的工具和武器.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_fo: $(l)工具$()$(br)開採等級: 7$(br)基礎耐久: 3918$(br)開採速度: 12$(br)攻擊傷害: 6$(br)附魔: 22$(br)火焰防護$(p)$(l)護甲$()$(br)耐久性乘數: 50$(br)全面防禦: 27$(br)韌性: 5$(br)附魔: 22$(br)火焰防護
text.astromine.warfare.nuclear_warhead.p: 一枚能摧毀一切生命形態的炸彈.
text.astromine.world.asteroid_ores.title: 小行星礦石
text.astromine.world.asteroid_ores.page_: $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)小行星$()中發現的礦脈, 可以用來獲取資源.$(p)當被開採時，會分別掉落 $(thing)$(l:world/ore_clusters)礦石簇$().
text.astromine.world.asteroids.title: 小行星
在星際空間中發現的以環狀、星團和許多其他形式巡航的異物；據說含有大量$(thing)$(l:world/asteroid_ores)礦石$().
text.astromine.world.meteor_ores.title: 隕石
text.astromine.world.meteor_ores.page_on: $(thing)$(l:world/meteors)流星$()中發現的礦脈, 可以用來獲取資源.$(p)當被開採時，會分別掉落$(thing)$(l:world/ore_clusters)礦群簇$().
text.astromine.world.meteors.title: 流星
text.astromine.world.meteors.page_one.te: 異物穿過空間, 與行星體相撞; 據說包含 $(thing)$(l:world/meteor_ores)異星礦石$().
text.astromine.world.ore_clusters.title: 礦群簇
text.astromine.world.ore_clusters.page_o: 從$(thing)$(l:world/asteroid_ores)小行星礦石$()中獲得礦石簇和$(thing)$(l:world/meteor_ores)隕石$(), 可以處理為資源.
text.astromine.world.ore_clusters.page_t: 對簇進行挑選將產生兩個$(thing)粉末$().
text.astromine.experimental_feature_batt: Experimental feature: only used for crafting!
text.astromine.experimental_feature_cani: Experimental feature: only used for crafting!
Gauntlets which can repel opponents. One must be worn on each hand, and they must be charged before they can activate$(p)Charging is done by holding right click with one in each hand, and takes energy.
text.astromine.machinery.inserter.title: Inserter
text.astromine.machinery.inserter.page_o: A machine which picks up items from its front and places them at its back, for item transportation.
text.astromine.machinery.conveyor.title: Conveyor
text.astromine.resources.silver.title: Silver
text.astromine.resources.silver.page_one: A metal with high electrical conductivity and a distinct white, lustrous texture.
text.astromine.resources.silver.page_two: $(item)Silver Ore$() can be found $(thing)underground$() in $(thing)The Overworld$().$(p)Mining requires only a $(item)Iron Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 2) or better, and can then be $(thing)smelted$() into a $(item)Silver Ingot$().
text.astromine.resources.silver.page_thr: Silver is very useful for basic electronics and tools. When combined with $(item)$(l:resources/copper)Copper$() in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(), it can make $(item)$(l:resources/electrum)Electrum$(). When combined with $(item)$(l:resources/copper)Copper$() in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(), it can make $(item)$(l:resources/sterling_silver)Sterling Silver$().
text.astromine.resources.silver.page_fou: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 462$(br)Mining Speed: 6.5$(br)Attack Damage: 2.0$(br)Enchantability: 20$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 17$(br)Total Defense: ?$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 22
text.astromine.resources.electrum.title: Electrum
text.astromine.resources.electrum.page_o: A metal with significant electrical conductivity and golden texture.
text.astromine.resources.electrum.page_t: Electrum can be obtained by combining 1 Gold Ingot and 1 Silver Ingot in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces 2 $(item)Electrum Ingots$().
Electrum is often used for coins.
text.astromine.resources.electrum.page_f: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 185$(br)Mining Speed: 11$(br)Attack Damage: 1.0$(br)Enchantability: 21$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 13$(br)Total Defense: ?$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 25
text.astromine.resources.fools_gold.page: A metal with used to obtain sulfur dioxide, which, due to its golden color, often confuses the unprepared traveller.
Fool's Gold can be obtained by combining 1 Iron Ingot and 1 Gunpowder in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces 2 $(item)Fool's Gold Ingots$().
Fool's Gold is often used for coins.

$(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 250$(br)Mining Speed: 6.5$(br)Attack Damage: 2.0$(br)Enchantability: 16$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 15$(br)Total Defense: ?$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 10
text.astromine.resources.rose_gold.title: Rose Gold
text.astromine.resources.rose_gold.page_: A metal with significant electrical conductivity and rose, pink texture.
Rose Gold can be obtained by combining 1 Gold Ingot and 1 Silver Ingot in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces 2 $(item)Rose Gold Ingots$().
Rose Gold is often used for coins.

$(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 1$(br)Base Durability: 64$(br)Mining Speed: 10$(br)Attack Damage: 0.5$(br)Enchantability: 24$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 9$(br)Total Defense: ?$(br)Toughness: 0.1$(br)Enchantability: 25
text.astromine.resources.sterling_silver: A metal with significant electrical conductivity and silvery texture.
Sterling Silver can be obtained by combining 3 Silver Ingots and 1 Copper Ingot in an $(item)$(l:machinery/alloy_smelter)Alloy Smelter$(). This produces 4 $(item)Sterling Silver Ingots$().
Sterling Silver is often used for tooling.
